name: Achromatopsia
description:
A Point & Click Horror Adventure Game made for Global Game Jam 2021 - themed Lost and Found. 

For  some reason the web build can't be played in itch.io site so instead you can download it and open the html file in the browser. We will fix this soon.

When color fades away from your world, something changed...... 

Press 'A'，'D' to move left & right； Press 'E' to interact； Press 'W' to Pick Object； Press 'Q' to switch flashlight between Red & White lights； Move mouse to adjust the angle of flashlight。
